sentences.source: He bowed his head in shame
She gave a respectful bow to the audience before beginning her speech
sentences.target: 在開始演講之前，她向觀眾恭敬地鞠了一躬

sentences.source: In Japanese culture, it's customary to bow as a sign of respect when greeting someone
sentences.target: 在日本文化中，問候某人時通常會鞠躬以示尊重

sentences.source: The actor took a deep bow after receiving a standing ovation for his performance
sentences.target: 演員在他的表演獲得全場起立鼓掌後深深鞠了一躬
